=== Linux kernel ===

I am a Linux kernel maintainer (mainline):
* <nowiki>[[https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/process/maintainers.html#memory-controller-drivers|Memory controller drivers]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/process/maintainers.html#nfc-subsystem|NFC subsystem and drivers]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/process/maintainers.html#arm-samsung-s3c-s5p-and-exynos-arm-architectures|Samsung S3C/Exynos ARM and ARM64 architectures]]</nowiki>
* Pinctrl, ASoC, PMIC and MUIC drivers for Exynos based boards

I regularly contribute to the Linux kernel. See <nowiki>[[https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/log/?qt=author&q=kozlowski|the list of Linux kernel contributions]]</nowiki>.
